member.name: M:Topology.IO.Ogr.OgrReader.ReadGeometry(OSGeo.OGR.Geometry)
member.summary: Returns object converted from . If geometry conversion is not possible or input geometry is empty, returns empty .

member.name: T:Topology.IO.Ogr.OgrReader
member.summary: Reads GDAL/OGR geometries and creates geometric representation of the features based on JTS model.
